content: शांभव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [शंभोरिदं अण्] Belonging to Śiva; अत्तुं वांछति शांभबो गणपतेराखुं क्षुधार्तः फणी <ls>Pt. 1. 159.</ls> --वः {@--1@} A worshipper of Śiva. {@--2@} A son of Śiva. {@--3@} Camphor. {@--4@} Bdellium. {@--5@} A kind of poison. --वं The {%Devadāru%} tree.
शांभवी {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Pārvatī. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (नीलदूर्वा). {@--3@} The opening in the crown of the head through which the soul is said to escape.
